quest.name: Path of No Return
journal: All warriors must choose their own path, as Gosetsu well knows.
objectives: Rendezvous with Yugiri at Yuzuka Manor.

dialogue.name: GOSETSU
dialogue.text: I will not pursue her. It is for her to think on our master's words and recognize the futility of her course.

dialogue.name: GOSETSU
dialogue.text: Those, at least, are my thoughts upon the matter. Yours may be different. Should you wish to give chase, I will not bar your path.

dialogue.name: GOSETSU
dialogue.text: ...We each have but one life, and it is not to be spent recklessly in pursuit of our goals. I pray she realizes this soon...

dialogue.name: GOSETSU
dialogue.text: Zenos will fall, but not to a desperate knife in the dark. We will need to plan and prepare, and she has done neither.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: ...Did Gosetsu send you to stop me?

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: Then you came of your own free will? I should be surprised if you agreed with my chosen course. No one else did.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: But it is not as fanciful as they would have you believe. Scant moments ago, I received the crown prince's itinerary from one of our spies in the castle.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: 'Twould seem that Zenos has no desire to remain in Doma any longer than necessary. He wishes to inspect the Moon Gates this very eve.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: His impatience is to our advantage. He arrived without warning and gave Yotsuyu no time to prepare. The whole castle is in state of upheaval.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: To avoid any delay, he has declined a full escort, and will be traveling with no more than a handful of soldiers. The kami could not have blessed us with more auspicious circumstances. I will kill him, Forename. I will.

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: You mean we will kill him.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Not alone.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: ...Or die trying. You understand the risks.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: Forgive me. Of course you do. Mayhap better than I.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: ...But are you sure?

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: I know the odds. I know what he is capable of, and that in an open confrontation, I will likely die.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: But if I do not─if I succeed, then countless lives will be saved. Doma, Ala Mhigo─everything will change! One life for that world is a price I would pay a thousand times over!

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: ...What? What is it? Why are you looking at me like that?

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: ...Do you mean to join me?

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: Thank you. Thank you. I...I cannot well express what this means to me.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: We have much to discuss, but we can do so on the way.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: Yuzuka Manor is some distance from here. We must hurry!

dialogue.name: ISSE
dialogue.text: ...Stay calm. No one knows you were here. No one knows you saw anything.

dialogue.name: ISSE
dialogue.text: No one knows you overheard two rebels plotting...to kill the crown prince...

dialogue.name: ISSE
dialogue.text: Gah! Stupid, stupid, stupid! You know how this ends! And they only have themselves to blame! You have to tell them. You have to...

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: This is far enough. Let us discuss our plan of attack...
